snippet: A homeless former convict who was killed Sunday by the Los Angeles police was wanted for violating probation in a bank robbery case,
abstract: Charley Saturmin Robinet, homeless man killed during confrontation with Los Angeles police, was wanted for violating probation related to his former conviction in bank robbery case.
lead_paragraph: A homeless former convict who was killed Sunday by the Los Angeles police was wanted for violating probation in a bank robbery case,

headline.main: California: Man Killed by Police Was Ex-Convict
headline.print_headline: California: Man Killed by Police Was Ex-Convict
